DOC.brief_summary: This will be a study in 6 healthy male subjects, each receiving a single oral dose of 100 mg [14C]-radiolabeled GLPG0634. The study aims to establish the elimination pathways of GLPG0634 and their relative significance and to assess the metabolite profile of GLPG0634 in plasma and in excreta. Furthermore, the pharmacokinetics (PK) of the main metabolites in plasma relative to GLPG0634 will be evaluated. This study will also provide safety and tolerability information for GLPG0634.
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of the Pharmacokinetics and Metabolism of GLPG0634 in Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: male, between 40 and 65 years of age, inclusive within BMI range 18 to 30 kg/m2, inclusive Any condition that might interfere with the procedures or tests in this study Drug or alcohol abuse Smoking
